transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello, good morning sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir, I am Ashish calling you from IndiaMART. Your account number is.
Customer: Haan haan haan, okay okay, tell me sir.
Executive: How are you sir?
Customer: I am fine sir. I am in travel now.
Executive: Okay. Uh, tell me sir, are you free right now for five minutes?
Customer: Haan, okay.
Executive: Actually, actually yesterday we have talked regarding the OTP you are not getting on your mail ID sir, okay?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Yeah, the problem is solved sir?
Customer: Yes sir, yes sir, the problem is solved.
Executive: Okay, and we have to improve our catalog also sir. So you are free right now to so we can improve our catalog or I should call later.
Customer: Uh, sir, can you call me uh 45, 40 minutes or one hour.
Executive: Okay, okay. Otherwise when I I free I will call you also. I I have your number.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Okay. Okay, okay, no problem sir. Uh, sir, so here is your one request sir regarding email uh OTP, okay? I can close it sir?
Customer: Haan, yes sir.
Executive: The problem is resolved?
Customer: Problem resolved also.
Executive: Okay. Okay, thank you sir. I will connect you regarding the uh catalog uh improvement sir, okay? After uh two hours sir, okay?
Customer: Okay, okay, okay.
Executive: Okay, okay, thank you so much sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- OTP was not being received on mail ID.

- Wants to improve catalog.



Resolution:

- OTP issue resolved.

- Executive will call after 2 hours for catalog improvement.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, catalog, improvement
